amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: \ SEC. __. None of the funds made available in this Act may be used to make an application under section 501 of the Foreign Intelligence Surveillance Act of 1978 (50 U.S.C. 1861) for an order requiring the production of library circulation records, library patron lists, library Internet records, bookseller sales records, or bookseller customer lists.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit use of funds to support an order requiring the production of library circulation records, library patron lists, library Internet records, bookseller sales records, or bookseller customer lists.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Sanders amendment (A016) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A016) offered by Mr. Sanders.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Sanders amendment (A016) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
